Room.Name: Knight's Chapel
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the Chapel of Saint Therix, patron saint of dedicated knights.
Room.LongDescription: Sir Anton Therix, before his rise to sainthood, was known for his dedication to a single-minded purpose of retrieving a lost glove belonging to his king. His entire life was devoted to the quest, and after his death he was much admired for such a quality. He never did find the glove.
